item.title: Installing InfluxDB with High Availability
item.description: Forewords It is advisable to have high availability when serving data. We are considering debian GNU/Linux 10 during this process. With influxdb replication is achieved either by means of paying a managed influxdb instance, buying enteprise version, or implementing an influx-relay that offers bare-minumum high-availability. In this guide we will create 3 nodes (the minimum to have high availability) serving influxdb by means of a load balancer and an influx-relay.
